P

presentation - package presentation
 
price - Variable in class model.Product
 
processLineClient(String) - Method in class businessLayer.Management
A method which takes all the possible cases available in the command lines regarding Clients and perform the specific task;
processLineOrder(String) - Method in class businessLayer.Management
The method presents the variables declared in the Order command.
processLineProduct(String) - Method in class businessLayer.Management
A method which takes all the possible cases available in the command lines regarding Products and perform the specific task;
processLineReportClient(String) - Method in class businessLayer.Management
The method treats the case in which the given command requests a PDF Clients Report;
processLineReportOrder(String) - Method in class businessLayer.Management
The method treats the case in which the given command requests a PDF Order Report;
processLineReportProduct(String) - Method in class businessLayer.Management
The method treats the case in which the given command requests a PDF Products Report;
Product - Class in model
Product.java - a simple class created in order to resemble the "product" table from the MYSQL database created;
Product(String, int, double) - Constructor for class model.Product
The first constructor creates a new Product object with the given parameters;
Product(String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Product
The second constructor will create a new Product object with all the parameters given as String data type;
ProductBLL - Class in businessLayer
This Class will contain the Response on all the operations done on Products.
ProductBLL() - Constructor for class businessLayer.ProductBLL
 
ProductDAO - Class in dataAccess
ProductDAO.java - this is a more complex class, created in order to perform all of the operations needed for a Product; Here, the methods are designed using the Connection already established with the SQL database;
ProductDAO() - Constructor for class dataAccess.ProductDAO
 
productName - Variable in class model.Order
